column4: hej. what's recommended when it comes to the installation of 10.04. should I install it through the update manager software or should I download 10.04, burn it on cd then make the install?
from my experience if there are issues with 10.04 and your machine they will arise either way.  If that is what you are trying to avoid...
that's not what I meant. clean installation or upgrade? does it even matter?
upgrade should keep your files intact and installed programs as well
